Package it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.model

Interface Transaction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasID
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicTransaction
    public interface Transaction
extends HasID
    This interface extends the interface HasID and is implemented by all the classes that have the responsibility to manage a transaction. It allows to get the information related to the transaction: ID, date, total money amount, list of all the movements associated with the transaction and the list of all the tags associated to the transaction. The value obtainable with the method getTotalAmount() represents the total variation of the movements of the transaction.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_NULL_DATE
      The string error message for when a null date is passed.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_NULL_TRANSACTION
      The string error message for when a null Transaction is passed.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_TRANSACTION_ALREADY_EXISTS
      The string error message for when a Transaction is passed but it is already contained in the transactions list.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_TRANSACTION_DOES_NOT_EXIST
      The string error message for when a Transaction is passed to be removed but it is not contained in the transactions list.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_WRONG_ID
      The string error message for when an ID smaller than 1 is passed.
